Convert a SingleCellExperiment to BanksyObject

Source: R/interop.R
asBanksyObject.Rd

Convert a SingleCellExperiment to BanksyObject

asBanksyObject(
  se,
  expr.assay = "counts",
  features = NULL,
  coord.colnames = c("sdimx", "sdimy")
)

Arguments

se

object of class SingleCellExperiment or SpatialExperiment

expr.assay

expression assay to extract

features

features to extract from expression assay

coord.colnames

colnames of expression in metadata from SCE

Value

BanksyObject

Examples

data <- simulateDataset()
sce <- SingleCellExperiment::SingleCellExperiment(
    assays = list(counts = data$gcm), colData = data$locs)
bank <- asBanksyObject(sce, expr.assay = 'counts', 
                            coord.colnames = c('x', 'y'))
